img_above_text:
![Wukong MiddleHollow 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f4/Wukong_MiddleHollow_12.jpg)
It can also perform a surprising leap into the air to crash down on you, which is thankfully slow enough that you'll be able to dodge around to the side when it lands.
img_below_text:
If you find yourself having trouble avoiding getting poisoned, consider using the Pillar Stance to boost yourself up off the ground.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 13.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2f/Wukong_MiddleHollow_13.jpg)

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a boss fight in *Black Myth: Wukong* against the "Elder Amourworm." The player character is engaged in combat, wielding a glowing staff while the boss, a large worm-like creature, looms ahead. The setting is a dark, rocky area with fungal or egg-like growths scattered around. The health bar at the bottom indicates the boss's name and remaining health. This encounter likely involves avoiding the boss's poison attacks and aerial leaps, as described in the surrounding text.
